Experimental Methods in Political Science Section 1 Course Notes

Experimental Methods in Political Science Instructor: Katie McCabe Section 1 Course Notes This document will include important links and course notes for Experimental Methods in Political Science. This site will be updated throughout the semester with new content. The Canvas modules will provide links to the relevant sections to review for a given week of the course. The primary text for the course is Field Experiments: Design, Analysis, and Interpretation by Alan Gerber and Don Green. We will refer to this as FEDAI in the notes. This is a new and living document. If you spot errors or have questions or suggestions, please email me at k.mccabe@rutgers.edu or send a Slack message.
